article_title: Why Abbott Laboratories' Healthy Dividend Belongs on Your Radar
article_text:
Should You Buy These 6 Oversold Stocks? The Charts Say No

Oppenheimer says these six stocks -- down 10% or more since the beginning of April -- are 'thematically attractive,' but the technical charts say otherwise.

article_metadata.description: Given Abbott's track record of raising its dividend, it's become a must-own stock for the next five years.
article_metadata.author: Richard Saintvilus
